creatingScript.description: Degub information to show when the hint is creating the script to inject

description.message: This hint checks if the site is running any vulnerable library using https://snyk.io database

errorExecuting.description: Report message when the execution of the script fails

errorExecutingScript.description: Debug information to show when the execution of the script fails

errorLoadingSnyk.description: Debug information to show when there is an error loading snyk's data

filteringVulnerabilities.description: Debug information to show when the hint is filtering vulnerabilities

notFastEnough.description: Report message when evaluating the script takes too long
notFastEnough.message: webhint did not return the result fast enough

snkyDBIsOlder.description: Debug information to show when the snkyDB is old

tryAgainLater.description: Report message when there is an error running the script
tryAgainLater.message: $1. Please try again later, or report an issue if this problem persists.

updatingSnykDB.description: Debug information to show when the snykDB is going to be updated

versionNotCompliant.description: Logger error message to show when a package version is not semver compliantff

vulnerabilities.description: Report message when more than one vulnerability is found in a package
vulnerabilities.message: '$1 @ $2' has $3 known vulnerabilities ($4). See '$5' for more information.

vulnerability.description: Report message when a vulnerability is found in a package
vulnerability.message: '$1 @ $2' has $3 known vulnerability ($4). See '$5' for more information.
